title: Taken by Bikers
description: Warning: Your kindle might melt. This story is that hot.  From Meg Jackson, author of best-selling motorcycle club romance...  Sara's boyfriend thinks it'll be fun to spend the night at the town biker bar, but it turns out she's a lot more welcome than he is. After a rough biker stands up for her during a fight with her boyfriend, Sara finds herself unable to stay away from him, and she'll do anything or anybody to keep him.  A 20,000+ word novella.
author: Meg Jackson
